subject: Re: [junit] Some questions about JUnit 4
msgSnippet: ... That would be fine as well -- the most important thing is to have it available. -- Jason Rogers I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not
messageBody:
Bradley, Todd wrote:

> I certainly was not saddened by the announcement. I use Eclipse (for
> "interactive" test runs) and ant (for continuous integration tests,
> etc.) and have never used the GUI test runner even once. I don't feel
> like I'm missing anything. If people like to have a GUI test runner,
> how about making one and putting it in the JUnit add-ons area of
> junit.org?
>
That would be fine as well -- the most important thing is to have it
available.

--
Jason Rogers

"I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not I,
but Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in
the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God, who loved
me, and gave himself for me."
Galatians 2:20
